snippet: Bill Haas never trailed over the final 27 holes of regulation at the Valspar Championship in Palm Harbor, Fla., but Charl Schwartzel posted two big back-nine birdies to tie him and then won the playoff on No. 18.
abstract: Golf Roundup; Charl Schwartzel wins Valspar Championship in Palm Harbor, Fla; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Bill Haas never trailed over the final 27 holes of regulation at the Valspar Championship in Palm Harbor, Fla., but Charl Schwartzel posted two big back-nine birdies to tie him and then won the playoff on No. 18.

headline.main: Schwartzel Catches Haas and Prevails in a Playoff
headline.print_headline: Schwartzel Catches Haas and Prevails in a Playoff
